t:
My friend shouted over the noise of the compactor in the junkyard, “3, 2, 1, ready or not, here I come!”


I thought they would never find me here as I hid in the trunk of a car being lifted by the crane.
c:
I heard a familiar laugh and saw my friend standing inside the crane.



#junkyards #hideandseek #dangerous #horror #car #game #childhood #fear
